description: A delightful mix of fruity and classic tea bags, perfect for discovering new favorites. Enjoy a diverse range of flavors in one convenient box.
Explore a world of vibrant and unusual flavors with this mix of fruit and exotic tea bags. An adventurous blend for the curious palate.
A soothing collection of herbal and fruit-infused tea bags designed for relaxation and enjoyment. Perfect for any time of day.
Rejuvenate your senses with this crisp and clean selection of green and fresh tea bags. Ideal for a refreshing start to your day or a midday lift.
Indulge in the rich and robust flavors of this exquisite black tea mixbox. A collection of beautiful and bold black teas for connoisseurs.
Experience the unadulterated essence of pure black tea with this refined selection. Simple yet profoundly satisfying.
A gentle and clarifying blend of teas, perfect for a moment of calm and introspection. Enjoy the clarity in every sip.
Celebrate the festive season with this special Christmas tea mixbox. A blend of heartwarming flavors to bring joy.
Experience the authentic taste of Japan with this premium Sencha Fukujyu green tea. Known for its rich umami and vibrant color.
A refreshing twist on classic Sencha, infused with bright lemon notes. Perfect for a zesty and invigorating tea experience.
A cool and crisp green tea with a hint of invigorating menthol. Ideal for clearing your mind and refreshing your palate.
A heavenly blend of delicate green and white teas, offering a subtle sweetness and smooth finish. A truly angelic cup.
Savor the ephemeral beauty of cherry blossoms with this exquisite Sencha Sakura. Aromatic and delicate, a true taste of spring.
Delight in the fragrant embrace of traditional China Jasmine Tea. Hand-scented with fresh jasmine blossoms for a truly aromatic experience.
A classic gunpowder green tea, tightly rolled into pellets that unfurl to release a bold and earthy flavor. A venerable tea for contemplation.
A comforting black tea infused with the sweet, creamy notes of vanilla. A warm and inviting brew for any time of day.
The timeless classic, Earl Grey, a robust black tea delicately flavored with bergamot oil. Elegant and aromatic.
A prime example of a top-quality Assam tea from the Mokalbari estate. Known for its strong, malty flavor and bright liquor.
A traditional East Frisian blend, perfect for a strong and heartwarming cup. Best enjoyed with rock sugar and cream.
A high-grown Ceylon Orange Pekoe, offering a bright, brisk, and refreshing cup. Perfect for those who enjoy a lively black tea.
From the renowned Darjeeling estate, Margaret's Hope offers a delicate and floral black tea with muscatel notes. A truly exquisite experience.
The quintessential morning brew, English Breakfast is a robust and full-bodied black tea blend, perfect with milk and sugar.
A wonderfully aromatic black tea blend reminiscent of fresh orange cookies. Sweet, citrusy, and comforting.
A special blend of black teas, traditionally enjoyed on Sundays in East Frisia. Rich, smooth, and perfect for a leisurely afternoon.
Discover a treasure trove of flavors in this exquisite black tea blend, said to contain seven precious ingredients fit for an emperor.
A vibrant and robust rooibos tea, named for its fiery red hue and warm, earthy taste. Naturally caffeine-free.
A sweet and comforting rooibos tea from Windhoek, Namibia, infused with the delightful aroma of vanilla. A perfect evening drink.
Cozy up with this festive rooibos blend, featuring the warm spices of gingerbread and a hint of sweet orange. Tastes just like a treat!
Indulge your sweet tooth with this guilt-free rooibos blend, a delightful combination of sweet flavors that’s truly irresistible.
A rich and creamy rooibos tea with the decadent taste of caramel. A delightful, comforting beverage.
A nostalgic fruit tea blend reminiscent of fresh berries and blooming flowers from Grandma's own garden. Sweet and comforting.
A delightful fruit tea blend with the sweet, nutty notes of almond. A smooth and aromatic infusion.
A tropical paradise in a cup! This fruit tea blend is bursting with juicy mango and a medley of friendly fruit flavors.
Experience the vibrant and tangy taste of sea buckthorn in this invigorating fruit tea blend. Rich in flavor and goodness.
A refreshing and zesty fruit tea blend with the delightful tartness of rhubarb, perfect for a spritzy, invigorating drink.
An exotic and creamy fruit tea blend combining the sweetness of Turkish apple with the tang of yogurt and lime. A unique taste adventure.
A heartwarming fruit tea blend perfect for the Advent season, filled with festive spices and cozy flavors.
Drift away with this ethereal fruit tea blend, light and airy with a dreamy combination of fruity notes. Like catching clouds in a cup.
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with this vibrant fruit tea blend, bursting with exotic flavors inspired by Bora Bora.
A surprisingly refreshing fruit tea blend with a zesty, bitter lemon kick. Perfect for a cooling and invigorating drink.
An elegant fruit tea blend fit for royalty, featuring a sophisticated mix of fruit flavors that evoke grand palaces.
Rekindle your affection for fruit teas with this comforting and familiar blend, a true 'old love' for your taste buds.
A creamy and citrusy fruit tea blend that tastes like a dreamsicle. Perfect for a sweet and uplifting moment.
A unique and highly prized half-fermented Oolong from China, known for its distinct milky, creamy aroma and smooth taste.
An invigorating herb tea blend featuring the zesty warmth of ginger. Perfect for a revitalizing boost.
A refreshing and soothing herb tea blend with crisp peppermint, ideal for unwinding or a cool digestive aid.
A vibrant and tangy herb tea blend bursting with the citrusy goodness of orange and grapefruit. Refreshing and uplifting.
A comforting and warming herb tea blend designed to chase away the chill of bad weather. A cozy hug in a mug.
An Ayurvedic-inspired herb tea blend formulated to balance Kapha dosha, offering warmth and invigorating spices.
A calming and centering herb tea blend, perfect for enhancing your yoga practice or finding a moment of inner peace.
A classic digestive herb tea blend featuring the harmonious trio of fennel, aniseed, and cumin. Soothing and aromatic.
A nurturing and supportive herb tea blend specifically crafted for women's well-being. Gentle and balancing.
An Ayurvedic blend designed to soothe and balance Vata dosha, offering warmth and grounding properties.
A cooling and calming Ayurvedic blend created to balance Pitta dosha, perfect for hot days or when you need to chill out.
Pure and invigorating peppermint herb tea, known for its refreshing taste and soothing properties. A timeless classic.
Gentle and calming chamomile herb tea, perfect for unwinding after a long day or preparing for a restful night's sleep.
